name: Blackout Escape (Event Horizon School)
description:
The player, as a Caitiff vampire, ended up in a trap inside the Basement, because of a misunderstanding his Sire was killed by someone unknown.

For this he will be unjustly accused of the fact by the Camarilla, they will imprison him pending the sentence.

He feeling betrayed will swear allegiance to himself, denying the Camarilla and consequently also the Sabbat.

However, keeping to his own existence and perhaps also for the previous relations with the Camarilla still respects the Masquerade.

FEATURES LIST:

  • Vampires   
  • Horror
  • Escape Room

DEVELOPED BY:

BLUE SANDWICH

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1, 2021/2022)
